meanings.definition: To shape or mold into a particular form or shape.
meanings.sent1: She carefully ausforms the clay into a beautiful vase.

meanings.definition: A specific form or shape that something takes.
meanings.sent1: The artist admired the unique ausforms of the sculpture.
